message.body: One week of not getting laid is about all I can handle before turning into a velociraptor
Oh, whoops. To answer your question, my Grandma is doing well, still in the hospital but stable and well taken care of.
Thank you :) how was your/Ella/Nates thanksgiving?
Yeah, not getting laid is messing up my head too. Nate went to Ny for tgiving. Ella and I enjoyed our quiet friends giving tho
Yes, it sucks. Wtf, how do some people do it?!
Oooo hahahaha maybe! I'm going to hope so
I don't know, I wonder if its like giving up coffee, like once you're past the initial terrible withdraw symptoms, you have amazing clarity and energy?
